name: wiseCampaign
author: Wisemattic

sections.description:
wiseCampaign is a powerful and easy-to-use WordPress plugin designed to help businesses create engaging top bar marketing campaigns. Whether you’re a small business owner, online seller, or digital marketer, this plugin is the perfect solution to promote product discounts, seasonal offers, or special deals right from the top of your website. With wiseCampaign, you can effortlessly capture your visitors’ attention and boost conversions with customizable banners that match your branding.

This plugin is ideal for anyone looking to increase sales and visibility of their products or services. Start using wiseCampaign today and take your marketing strategy to the next level!

Here is how you can build your engaging top-bar marketing campaigns with wiseCampaign:

Usage Instructions

  1. Go to WiseCampaign -> Settings, toggle the status to Active to activate the banner, and select a template from the list of views. Then, click the Save button.

  2. Go to Appearance -> Customize -> wiseCampaign, to customize all the properties of the campaign banner.

New Features

  • Pre-Made Templates: Choose from a variety of pre-designed email templates to jumpstart your campaigns and save time on design.

  • Pre-Made Call to Action Buttons: Use eye-catching call to action buttons that are proven to drive engagement and conversions.

  • Countdown Timer: Create a sense of urgency with a customizable countdown timer, showcasing the offer timeframe to encourage immediate action.

  • Headline and Subheadline Options: Attract customer attention with impactful headline and subheadline suggestions tailored for various campaigns.

  • Logo Uploads: Easily add your website or offer logo to enhance brand recognition and professionalism in your campaigns.
sections.installation:
From Your WordPress Dashboard

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for wiseCampaign
  3. Click on Install Now Button
  4. Click on Activate Now After Installed in the Backend

From WordPress.org

  1. Download wiseCampaign
  2. Upload the ‘wisecampaignâ€™ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate wiseCampaign plugin from your plugins page
sections.faq:
Q. Who should use wiseCampaign?

A. This plugin is for everyone who wants to sell products or services.

Q. What are the requirements to use wiseCampaign?

A. You only need to have the latest version of WordPress on your website to begin with. wiseCampaign is essentially an addon for the default WordPress editor. Therefore, the latest WordPress installation along with a theme should be enough to get started.
